name: Single Sign On for WP | Login With SSO
author: keywoot

sections.description: Keywoot offers a WordPress Single Sign On (SSO) plugin that enables unlimited users to login/register on your WordPress site via SAML SSO with various Identity Providers (IdPs). Our plugin supports SAML 2.0 compliant IdPs such as Azure AD / Microsoft Entra ID, Azure AD B2C, Okta, GSuite / Google Apps / Google Workspace, Salesforce, Keycloak, ADFS, Shibboleth, Office 365, OneLogin, Auth0, and many more. This plugin acts as a SAML Service Provider (SP), establishing a secure trust between your WordPress site and your chosen IDP to authenticate and enable SSO / login for your users.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Navigate to Dashboard > Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for keywoot saml sso for wp. Locate and install WP-SSO | Single Sign On for WP | Login With SSO.
  3. Activate the plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Single Sign On for WP | Login With SSO by Keywoot.
  2. Unzip the downloaded file and upload the keywoot-saml-sso directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the SSO plugin from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is it possible to customize the SSO button for WP login Page

Yes, We support the customization of the SSO button in our Premium plan.

Is it possible to add SSO on any other page other than WP login page

Yes, We provide links and Shortcodes so that you can add SSO on any page

short_description: WP-SSO plugin helps your users to login to WordPress site with any SAML compliant Identity provider
description: Keywoot offers a WordPress Single Sign On (SSO) plugin that enables unlimited users to login/register on your WordPress site via SAML SSO with various Identity Providers (IdPs). Our plugin supports SAML 2.0 compliant IdPs such as Azure AD / Microsoft Entra ID, Azure AD B2C, Okta, GSuite / Google Apps / Google Workspace, Salesforce, Keycloak, ADFS, Shibboleth, Office 365, OneLogin, Auth0, and many more. This plugin acts as a SAML Service Provider (SP), establishing a secure trust between your WordPress site and your chosen IDP to authenticate and enable SSO / login for your users.

upgrade_notice: We support SSO with 30+ Identity Providers (IDP), login using Azure, Azure B2C, Okta, ADFS, Keycloak, Onelogin, Salesforce, Google Apps (Gsuite), Salesforce, Shibboleth, Centrify, Ping, Auth0 and other Identity Providers in our free plugin. We also support a Custosatible SSO button and many more features in Our Premium Plans
